title: Environmental Art Design Education Using a Problem-Based Dual Master Learning Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A competency-enhancement program for learners preparing for professional careers, strengthening environmental art design capabilities through problem-solving-centered collaborative learning.

learning_goals: Learners can design three concrete solutions using a problem-based approach to solve environmental art design problems
Creative design prototypes can be improved two or more times through a dual-master feedback system (industry expert + academic expert)
Design ideas can be shared in real-time with team members using digital collaboration tools (Figma, Miro, etc.)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
